channel.title: Centos on World of Forks
channel.description: Recent content in Centos on World of Forks

item.title: Centos初始化
item.description: 换源 备份 mv /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo.backup 写入国内源(centos 7) ustc： https://lug.ustc.edu.cn/wiki/mirrors/help/centos 163： # CentOS-Base.repo # # The mirror system uses the connecting IP address of the client and the # update status of each mirror to pick mirrors that are updated to and # geographically close to the client. You should use

item.title: Centos初始化2
item.description: proxychains-ng git clone https://github.com/rofl0r/proxychains-ng cd proxychains-ng ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc make make install make install-config # 生成配置文件 echo 'http 10.100.100.136 4411' >> /etc/proxychains.conf # 输入代理设置 TMUX CentOS的版本太老，手动编译最新版本 yum install ncurses-devel libevent-devel curl -L https://github.com/tmux/tmux/releases/download/2.3/tmux-2.3.tar.gz | tar xz cd tmux-2.3 ./configure make make
